DOC.brief_title: Phase 3 Trial Squamous Non Small Cell Lung Cancer Subjects Comparing Ipilimumab Plus Paclitaxel Carboplatin Versus Placebo Plus Paclitaxel Carboplatin
DOC.criteria: For information regard BMS clinical trial participation , please visit www.BMSStudyConnect.com Subjects NSCLC predominantly squamous histology document histology cytology brushing , wash needle aspiration define lesion sputum cytology alone Stage IV Recurrent NSCLC ( per 7th International Association Study Lung Cancer ( IASLC ) classification ) At least 1 measurable tumor lesion , define mWHO criterion , locate previously irradiate area Eastern Cooperative Oncology Group ( ECOG ) performance status â‰¤1 Brain metastasis Malignant pleural effusion recurrent Documented history severe autoimmune immune mediate symptomatic disease require prolong ( 2 month ) systemic immunosuppressive ( ie , steroid ) treatment
